title: Should be able to see champion's skin before lock in
body:
I've been playing LOL for 6 years, started from EUW and now play in OCE. I like the new client which looks really cool. However, I don't quite understand why Riot has removed the function which allows player to preview the skins for a particular champion before he locks in? I have bought over 300 skins in this game and I can hardly see them unless I click on my collection -> champions -> skins which is very troublesome. 

Riot please, get that function back for summoners.
